title: How do I ask Riot questions like featured on their question blog?
body: Where and how? Cause I have some that I'd like answered!

replies.body: There's actually been a running blog called [Ask Riot](https://ask.leagueoflegends.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where you can ask questions for the devs.  They'll answer as much as they can in a follow up blog.  They can't respond to every answer, but they'll certainly read every submissions.  Good luck!

necromancing thread:

is "ask riot" bound to region? im on euw and it keeps asking me to login, even when I am already logged in.
Nope, you should be able to post your question.  See if the [EUW announcement link ](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/q/its-your-turn-ask-riot)works for you.
